meanings.sent1: The doctor will revaccinate the patient to ensure full protection.
meanings.sent2: It is important to revaccinate your pets regularly to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent3: After forgetting to revaccinate, the owner realized their mistake and hurried to the clinic.
meanings.sent4: Just like updating software on a computer, revaccinating helps keep the immune system strong.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to revaccinate your plants to prevent diseases from spreading.

meanings.definition: To administer a vaccine for a second time.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will revaccinate the child to boost immunity.
meanings.sent2: It is common practice to revaccinate individuals before traveling to certain countries.
meanings.sent3: The superhero decided to revaccinate the entire city to protect them from a new threat.
meanings.sent4: In the fight against the virus, revaccinating the population is crucial.
meanings.sent5: The scientist recommended to revaccinate the experiment subjects for accurate results.
